item.title: Before Jeeps Became SUVs, They Looked Like This
item.description: 1950 Willys Jeepster: A Throwback to an Era When Cars Were for Fun The 1950 Willys Jeepster is a car that is a throwback to an era when “people would use cars for fun.” The Jeepster was originally designed as a more stylish and luxurious alternative to the military-style Jeeps that were popular at the time.
